sec.p: Sevoflurane (C 4H 3F 7O) and isoflurane (C 3H 2ClF 5O) were obtained commercially and used without further purification methods. No impurities were found in their respective mass spectra (See Supplementary Figs S6– S7). HPLC grade methanol (≥99.9%) and diethyl ether (≥99.9%) were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich and used as received.
